_instructions: This file contains all my projects. Edit this file to add,
remove, or update projects on my portfolio.
IMPORTANT: This is a JSON file. Be careful with commas!
- Each project needs a comma after it EXCEPT the last one
- Each field needs a comma after it EXCEPT the last one in that project
- id: A unique identifier (any text, no spaces)
- technologies: An array of tech used ['Tech1', 'Tech2']
- image: Path to project image (put images in assets/projects/)
- github: GitHub URL (typically for personal projects)
TO ADD A PROJECT: Copy one of the examples below and modify it
TO REMOVE A PROJECT: Delete the entire {...} block (and fix commas)

projects.title: Skincare rec
description: Built LLM-based skincare product recommendation system
Accepts user questions and provides personalized suggestions
Developed for Applied Machine Learning course

projects.title: Colorectal cancer Study
description: Analyzed colorectal cancer data to derive insights
Created visualizations and plots for data exploration
Built for Data Visualization course

projects.title: Book recommendation system
description: Built LLM-based book recommendation system
Accepts user questions and provides personalized suggestions
I am an avid reader but sometimes struggle to find books that match my interests. This project aims to solve that problem by leveraging the power of LLMs to provide tailored book recommendations.

projects.title: Generative AI for Data Analytics
description: Engineered Generative AI data validation systems using Claude API on Databricks and Cortex AI with Mistral-large2 on Snowflake
Achieved 70% better accuracy in detecting data anomalies
Built NLP pipelines to process AI outputs into structured tables
Automated ThoughtSpot reports for business users
Deployed interactive Streamlit dashboards on Azure enabling self-service visualization
Reduced manual validation burden by 80%

projects.title: Email Alerting System
description: Developed automated pipeline monitoring system using Python within Snowflake
Queried execution logs and tracked daily status of all data pipelines
Engineered proactive email alerts notifying stakeholders of failures within 120 seconds
Included specific job names and timestamps in alerts
Enhanced operational visibility and reduced downtime
Eliminated manual log checks and accelerated response times

projects.title: GBS Reporting
description: Architected centralized Snowflake stage environment consolidating data from multiple subject area tables
Streamlined access to vital business metrics for the GBS team
Developed automated ThoughtSpot dashboards for daily source-to-target data comparisons
Enabled real-time error detection
Enhanced data integrity and reduced manual reporting effort
Implemented self-service analytics, eliminating tedious daily table iteration

projects.title: View Regression Automation
description: Constructed automated regression testing framework in Python for data integrity certification
Monitored data integrity across multiple Snowflake layers (ILA, ILB, Base Model)
Engineered monitoring for over 1,000 production database views
Automatically categorized views by project and logged performance impacts
Developed user-friendly tool generating validation queries from table names alone
Simplified testing for non-technical users
Recognized as final university thesis

projects.title: IoT based Smart Irrigation System
description: Formulated and prototyped smart IoT irrigation system using NodeMCU ESP8266
Integrated soil moisture and DHT11 sensors for real-time environmental data collection
Transmitted data to cloud interface for monitoring
Engineered automated watering solution optimizing agricultural water usage
Supported sustainability goals through data-driven triggers
Published system architecture and results in IFERP journal
Contributed to IoT applications in sustainable agriculture

projects.title: Tiny Transformer for Shakespeare Text Generation
description: Built Tiny Transformer architecture for next-token prediction on Shakespeare text corpus
Implemented WordPiece tokenization with vocabulary size of 500 tokens
Designed transformer with 3 layers, 8 attention heads, and 128 hidden dimensions (722,676 parameters)
Achieved validation perplexity of 45.25 (11x better than random guessing)
Trained using GPU acceleration with cosine annealing learning rate schedule
Generated coherent Shakespeare-style text samples with temperature-based sampling
Visualized attention patterns across multiple heads and layers
Developed for Applied Machine Learning course

projects.title: Drosophila Larval Brain Network Analysis
description: Performed community detection on Drosophila connectome using Louvain algorithm and label propagation
Conducted spatial distribution analysis using K-nearest neighbors, Hopkins statistic, and Ripley's K function
Implemented multi-scale analysis comparing network structure and spatial organization across neural communities
Optimized code with vectorized operations using NumPy and efficient nearest-neighbor search with ball trees
Analyzed synaptic distributions to detect clustering patterns and functional specialization
Monitored over 1,000 production database views for performance impacts
Visualized community structures, spatial distributions, and multi-scale patterns
